adv: I find it really interesting to be able to look at either subsets of the fields I've selected (for when I have three selected) or plots with an added dimension to what I'm already looking at.
disadv: Some of the plots seemed much more useful than others, specifically when it came to introducing a third field that was easily understandable on a plot given the two fields already selected.
comment: Some kind of toggle between bins and means where applicable might be good (or not, but just a thought).
